name: Pink Onion
author: Demy T.
description:
Ordered delivery. 

Prepare yourself for the most decadent pizza. We ordered the Magic Mushroom Pizza. It is incredibly rich and by rich I mean greasy but so delicious. If you like truffle and Prosciutto this is the pizza for you. 

It is a thin crust pizza with a very thick crust. 
Usually my boyfriend and I can finish the whole thing but we were too full/ need to give the liver a break. 

We would order from pink onion again only on cheat days.
